items.sentence: You know that I'll never be able to do that again, don't you?
You do know that you shouldn't be doing that here, don't you?
You didn't know I was supposed to do that yesterday, did you?
Drying this fabric at a high temperature may cause shrinkage.
I don't have everything I want, but I want everything I have.
Tom found out that he was supposed to be in Boston by Monday.
Tom told me he thought Mary was better at French than he was.
Tom told me that he doesn't care whether you like him or not.
Tom told me that he thought it would be dangerous to do that.
Tom denied that he was the one who'd killed the prison guard.
